ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p:
This work was financially supported by the
10.13039/501100004329 Slovenian Research Agency
[research core funding P4–0407, project L4-9325, and program for young researchers in the accordance with agreement on (co) financing research activity in 2019 1000-18-0105], the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry, and Food, and JP Centralna Čistilna Naprava Domžale-Kamnik d.o.o. wastewater treatment plant. We thank Assoc. Prof. Dr Jana Žel for her valuable input to the manuscript.
